collectible.title: Fate's Hat
collectible.subtitle: Hopefully he wont be upset you swiped it.
collectible.text: Caught off guard that you beat him without even fully covering yourself, Fates hat fell off of his head as began to masturbate. I'm sure he wouldn't mind you "Safeguarding" it for him.
collectible.unlock: Defeat Twisted Fate with an extreme handicap.

collectible.title: Fates Calling Cards
collectible.subtitle: They surge with luck
collectible.text: Three primary colored cards with a strange feeling to them. You feel like you could get away with things you never would while holding them. Why would Twisted Fate give you these?
